about.description:
It turns out that many projects need to parse executable formats and they usually re-implement
their own parser. Moreover these parsers are usually bound to one language.
LIEF attempts to fill this void.
about.summary: A cross platform library to parse, modify and abstract ELF, PE and MachO formats.

name: py-lief
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: py-lief
    version: 0.10.1
source:
    -   fn: lief-0.10.1.tar.gz
        patches:
            - 0001-python-Only-pass-NODEFAULTLIB-MSVCRT-when-not-BUILD_.patch
            - 0002-Fix-typo-BuildeVersion-BuildVersion-which-may-lead-t.patch
            - 0003-Export-BuildToolVersion.patch
            - 0004-Do-not-annotate-static-ELF-Parser-s-parse-function-a.patch
            - 0005-Update-LIEF_VERSION_PATCH-to-1-for-v0.10.1.patch
            - 0006-Call-the-C-DLL-libLIEF.dll-so-it-does-not-clash-with.patch
            - 0007-Add-LIEFOptions-for-BUILD_STATIC_LIBS-and-BUILD_SHAR.patch
            - 0008-Add-_DEBUG-when-CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE-matches-Debug.patch
            - 0009-Avoid-deprecated-get_config_var-SO-use-EXT_SUFFIX-lo.patch
        sha256: 6f30c98a559f137e08b25bcbb376c0259914b33c307b8b901e01ca952241d00a
        url: https://github.com/lief-project/LIEF/archive/0.10.1.tar.gz
build:
    ignore_run_exports:
        - libgcc-ng
        - python
    number: 0
    run_exports:
        - py-lief >=0.10.1,<0.11.0a0
    string: py38h8e8fcc4_0
requirements:
    build:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 0_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.34 h0f24833_7

        - cmake 3.17.0 hfb1cb51_0

        - gcc_impl_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h8635c71_6
        - gcc_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h96fe1e1_20
        - gxx_impl_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h822a55f_6
        - gxx_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h96fe1e1_20
        - krb5 1.17.1 hc2f0735_1
        - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.34 h0f24833_7
        - libcurl 7.71.1 he8386ad_2
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 h01e2fff_1
        - libgcc-ng 8.4.0 hdd5993f_6
        - libgomp 8.4.0 hdd5993f_6
        - libssh2 1.9.0 h0e66b82_4
        - libstdcxx-ng 8.4.0 h822a55f_6
        - libuv 1.38.0 h6eb9509_0
        - ncurses 6.2 hb209c28_1
        - ninja 1.10.0 h1bb5118_0
        - openssl 1.1.1g h6eb9509_0
        - pkg-config 0.29.2 h6eb9509_1006
        - rhash 1.3.6 h14c3975_1001
        - tk 8.6.10 h151fe60_0
        - xz 5.2.5 h6eb9509_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h6eb9509_1006
    host:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 0_gnu
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - certifi 2020.6.20 py38h32f6830_0
        - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.34 h0f24833_7
        - libffi 3.2.1 hb209c28_1007
        - libgcc-ng 8.4.0 hdd5993f_6
        - libgomp 8.4.0 hdd5993f_6
        - liblief 0.10.1 hb209c28_0
        - libstdcxx-ng 8.4.0 h822a55f_6
        - ncurses 6.2 hb209c28_1
        - openssl 1.1.1g h6eb9509_0
        - pip 20.1.1 py_1
        - python 3.8.2 h54393fb_7_cpython
        - python_abi 3.8 1_cp38
        - readline 8.0 h41a240f_2
        - setuptools 49.2.0 py38h32f6830_0
        - sqlite 3.32.3 hd61ad8c_1
        - tk 8.6.10 h151fe60_0
        - wheel 0.34.2 py_1
        - xz 5.2.5 h6eb9509_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h6eb9509_1006
    run:
        - libgcc-ng >=8.4.0
        - liblief 0.10.1 hb209c28_0
        - libstdcxx-ng >=8.4.0
        - python >=3.8,<3.9.0a0
        - python_abi 3.8.* *_cp38
test:
    imports:
        - lief
    requires:
        - gxx_linux-ppc64le 8.*
about:
    description: 'It turns out that many projects need to parse executable formats
        and they usually re-implement

        their own parser. Moreover these parsers are usually bound to one language.

        LIEF attempts to fill this void.

        '
    doc_source_url: https://github.com/lief-project/LIEF/tree/master/doc
    doc_url: https://lief.quarkslab.com/doc/stable/index.html
    home: https://lief.quarkslab.com/
    license: Apache-2.0
    license_family: Apache
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: A cross platform library to parse, modify and abstract ELF, PE and MachO
        formats.
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - isuruf
        - mingwandroid
        - msarahan

It turns out that many projects need to parse executable formats and they usually re-implement
their own parser. Moreover these parsers are usually bound to one language.
LIEF attempts to fill this void.
